title: Martin Stockyards - City of Martin
text: Martin Stockyards Discover the freshest farm-to-table offerings at Martin Stockyards, a new gem in Martin, Tennessee. Martin Stockyards prides itself on providing high-quality, locally sourced meats, including beef from their own farm, pork from Tosh Farms, as well as chicken and lamb. Beyond meats, they offer farm-fresh eggs, honey, and other artisanal products, ensuring customers have access to the best that local farmers have to offer. Whether you’re planning a family barbecue or simply seeking the freshest ingredients, Martin Stockyards is a must-visit destination that embodies the heart of Martin’s agricultural heritage. Hours of Operation - Sunday – Monday: Closed - Tuesday – Friday: 2:00 pm – 6:00 pm - Saturday: 10:00 am – 2:00 pm Address: Martin Stockyards – 8504 Highway 45 South, Martin, TN, 38237
